Description: Sylvain Charlebois, director of Agri Food Analytics Lab at Dalhousie University, speaks to the Financial Post s Larysa Harapyn in the video below about how rising crop prices will affect food prices ul Oil is at 70 pay your bills Farmer
Title: Soaring crop prices will catch up to consumers
Author: Larysa Harapyn

Description: Hundreds of students are scrambling for a place to live after they learned last week there's no room for them in Dalhousie University's residences for the upcoming school year
Title: Dal students scrambling for housing after university limits residence spaces
Author: Frances Willick

Description: Federal funding and provincial government co operation are key to making sure a major overhaul of Canada's child welfare system becomes a reality in Nova Scotia, says an assistant professor at Dalhousie University
Title: How an overhaul of the child welfare system could keep more Mi'kmaw youth close to home
Author: CBC News

Description: A Dalhousie University professor does not think blue green algae is to blame for the contamination at Grand Lake, N S , which led to the deaths of two dogs and sent a person to hospital last week
Title: Expert says blue green algae may not be cause of Grand Lake contamination
Author: Haley Ryan

Description: For a new paper published in the journal Clinical Microbiology Reviews, a team of researchers led by Concordia engineers sifted through hundreds of papers on COVID 19 detection tools and technologies They wanted to categorize and understand what exists, what
Title: Concordia researchers break down the COVID 19 diagnostic arsenal
Author: No Data Available
